page.title: 181ST. URSWICK GUIDES,ADGARLEY
page.content: 1st. Urswick Guides meet weekly on a Monday from 4.oo.pm-6.oo.pm, in Stainton recreation hall which was built as a chapel. They cook themselves a snack first and then get into their patrols and do badge work. They go off on camping holidays and sleep in tents. Their names are below. Victoria Marsh-Vanessa Kirk-Rachel Nutall-Melanie Gregory-Joanne Bright- Catherine Redshaw-Anne Salway-Angela Stables-Jackie Elward-Carolynne Quale-Rachel Park-Joanne Swarbrick -Victoria Kingston-Sharron Thompson -Emma Ronald- Clare Turner-Natalie Gormon-Bridget Eves-Tracy Fearnet- Patricia Derbyshire. PATROLS. White Heather,Primrose,Bluebell and Scarlet Pimpenel. 1st leader-J.Taylor. 2nd leader N.Quayle. Treasurer-S.Clerk. Young leader M.Quayle.
